verses.verse: And one <S%G1520><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> who had <S%G2192><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> bowls <S%G5357><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and spoke <S%G2980><s%> with me, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Come <S%G1204><s%> here, <S%G1204><s%> I shall show <S%G1166><s%> you the judgment <S%G2917><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> harlot <S%G4204><s%> who sits <S%G2521><s%> on many <S%G4183><s%> waters, <S%G5204><s%>

with whom <S%G3739><s%> the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> committed <S%G4203><s%> [acts of] immorality, <S%G4203><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who dwell <S%G2730><s%> on the earth <S%G1093><s%> were made <S%G3184><s%> drunk <S%G3184><s%> with the wine <S%G3631><s%> of her immorality. <S%G4202><s%> "

And he carried <S%G667><s%> me away <S%G667><s%> in the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> into a wilderness; <S%G2048><s%> and I saw <S%G3708><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> on a scarlet <S%G2847><s%> beast, <S%G2342><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> of blasphemous <S%G988><s%> names, <S%G3686><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> and ten <S%G1176><s%> horns. <S%G2768><s%>

And the woman <S%G1135><s%> was clothed <S%G4016><s%> in purple <S%G4210><s%> and scarlet, <S%G2847><s%> and adorned <S%G5558><s%> with gold <S%G5553><s%> and precious <S%G5093><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%> and pearls, <S%G3135><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> in her hand <S%G5495><s%> a gold <S%G5552><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> of abominations <S%G946><s%> and of the unclean <S%G169><s%> things <S%G169><s%> of her immorality, <S%G4202><s%>

and upon her forehead <S%G3359><s%> a name <S%G3686><s%> [was] written, <S%G1125><s%> a mystery, <S%G3466><s%> "BABYLON <S%G897><s%> THE GREAT, <S%G3173><s%> THE MOTHER <S%G3384><s%> OF HARLOTS <S%G4204><s%> AND OF THE ABOMINATIONS <S%G946><s%> OF THE EARTH. <S%G1093><s%>"

And I saw <S%G3708><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> drunk <S%G3184><s%> with the blood <S%G129><s%> of the saints, <S%G40><s%> and with the blood <S%G129><s%> of the witnesses <S%G3144><s%> of Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> And when I saw <S%G3708><s%> her, I wondered <S%G2296><s%> greatly. <S%G2295><s%> <S%G3173><s%>

And the angel <S%G32><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to me, "Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> do you wonder <S%G2296><s%>? I shall tell <S%G3004><s%> you the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the woman <S%G1135><s%> and of the beast <S%G2342><s%> that carries <S%G941><s%> her, which has <S%G2192><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> and the ten <S%G1176><s%> horns. <S%G2768><s%>

"The beast <S%G2342><s%> that you saw <S%G3708><s%> was and is not, and is about <S%G3195><s%> to come <S%G305><s%> up out of the abyss <S%G12><s%> and to go <S%G5217><s%> to destruction. <S%G684><s%> And those <S%G3588><s%> who dwell <S%G2730><s%> on the earth <S%G1093><s%> will wonder, <S%G2296><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> has not been written <S%G1125><s%> in the book <S%G975><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> from the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> when they see <S%G991><s%> the beast, <S%G2342><s%> that he was and is not and will come. <S%G3918><s%>

"Here <S%G5602><s%> is the mind <S%G3563><s%> which has <S%G2192><s%> wisdom. <S%G4678><s%> The seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> are seven <S%G2033><s%> mountains <S%G3735><s%> on which <S%G3699><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> sits, <S%G2521><s%>

and they are seven <S%G2033><s%> kings; <S%G935><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> have fallen, <S%G4098><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> is, the other <S%G243><s%> has not yet <S%G3768><s%> come; <S%G2064><s%> and when <S%G3752><s%> he comes, <S%G2064><s%> he must <S%G1163><s%> remain <S%G3306><s%> a little <S%G3641><s%> while. <S%G3641><s%>

"And the beast <S%G2342><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was and is not, is himself <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> an eighth, <S%G3590><s%> and is [one] of the seven, <S%G2033><s%> and he goes <S%G5217><s%> to destruction. <S%G684><s%>

"And the ten <S%G1176><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you saw <S%G3708><s%> are ten <S%G1176><s%> kings, <S%G935><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> have not yet <S%G3768><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> a kingdom, <S%G932><s%> but they receive <S%G2983><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> as kings <S%G935><s%> with the beast <S%G2342><s%> for one <S%G1520><s%> hour. <S%G5610><s%>
"These <S%G3778><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> purpose <S%G1106><s%> and they give <S%G1325><s%> their power <S%G1411><s%> and authority <S%G1849><s%> to the beast. <S%G2342><s%>

"These <S%G3778><s%> will wage <S%G4170><s%> war <S%G4170><s%> against <S%G3326><s%> the Lamb, <S%G721><s%> and the Lamb <S%G721><s%> will overcome <S%G3528><s%> them, because <S%G3754><s%> He is Lord <S%G2962><s%> of lords <S%G2962><s%> and King <S%G935><s%> of kings, <S%G935><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are with Him [are the] called <S%G2822><s%> and chosen <S%G1588><s%> and faithful. <S%G4103><s%>"

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to me, "The waters <S%G5204><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you saw <S%G3708><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> the harlot <S%G4204><s%> sits, <S%G2521><s%> are peoples <S%G2992><s%> and multitudes <S%G3793><s%> and nations <S%G1484><s%> and tongues. <S%G1100><s%>

"And the ten <S%G1176><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you saw, <S%G3708><s%> and the beast, <S%G2342><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> will hate <S%G3404><s%> the harlot <S%G4204><s%> and will make <S%G4160><s%> her desolate <S%G2049><s%> and naked, <S%G1131><s%> and will eat <S%G2068><s%> her flesh <S%G4561><s%> and will burn <S%G2618><s%> her up with fire. <S%G4442><s%>

"For God <S%G2316><s%> has put <S%G1325><s%> it in their hearts <S%G2588><s%> to execute <S%G4160><s%> His purpose <S%G1106><s%> by having <S%G4160><s%> a common <S%G1520><s%> purpose, <S%G1106><s%> and by giving <S%G1325><s%> their kingdom <S%G932><s%> to the beast, <S%G2342><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the words <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> should be fulfilled. <S%G5055><s%>

"And the woman <S%G1135><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you saw <S%G3708><s%> is the great <S%G3173><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> which reigns <S%G2192><s%> <S%G932><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%>"
